channel.title: C2 on My notes and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in C2 on My notes and snippets

item.title: Empire
item.description: Empire Install System git clone --recursive https://github.com/BC-SECURITY/Empire.git cd Empire sudo ./setup/install.sh sudo poetry install Docker # Pull the latest image docker pull bcsecurity/empire:latest ​ # Run the server with the rest api and socket ports open docker run -it -p 1337:1337 -p 5000:5000 bcsecurity/empire:latest ​ # Run the client docker run -it -p 1337:1337 -p 5000:5000 bcsecurity/empire:latest client ​ # To run the client against the already running server container docker container ls docker exec -it {container-id} .
